snippet: The Supreme Court raised serious doubts Tuesday about a $399 million judgment against smartphone maker Samsung for illegally copying parts of the patented design of Apple's iPhone.

headline.main: Justices Raise Doubts About $399M Judgment Against Samsung

snippet: The U.S. is looking for multibillion dollar penalties from Germany's biggest bank and its biggest carmaker. The European Union is demanding similarly large sums from America's most valuable tech company, Apple.

headline.main: US, Europe Fray Each Other's Nerves With Company Crackdowns

snippet: The following list represents the most viral tracks on Spotify, based on the number of people who shared it divided by the number who listened to it, from Friday Sept. 30, to Thursday Oct. 6, via Facebook, Tumblr, Twitter and Spotify.

Samsung Electronics Co Ltd scrapped its flagship Galaxy Note 7 smartphone on Tuesday less than two months after its launch, dealing a huge blow to its reputation and outlook after failing to resolve safety concerns.

headline.main: Samsung Scraps Galaxy Note 7 Over Fire Concerns
headline.print_headline: Samsung Scraps Galaxy Note 7 Over Fire Concerns

snippet: Benchmark United States crude rose 3.1 percent, to $51.35 a barrel, its highest close since July 2015. Investors also reacted to the presidential race.
abstract: Stocks rise with crude oil and energy leading way as investors react to Donald J Trump's latest campaign crisis.

headline.main: Wall St. Closes Higher as Oil Prices Climb
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Up as Oil Prices Climb

snippet: The move is a major setback for the worldâ€™s largest producer of smartphones, which had been gaining ground against Apple in the high-end market.
abstract: Samsung announces halt to production of Galaxy Note 7 smartphone and asks retailers and telecom carriers to stop selling them until defect that caused several fires is fixed; also requests consumers with any Galaxy Note 7 device to power it off and not use it.

headline.main: Samsung Halts Galaxy Note 7 Production as Battery Problems Linger
headline.print_headline: Samsung Halts Galaxy Note 7 Production as Battery Issues Linger
